message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe is worth more than $150 to you. Considering its quality and unique features, I would like to propose a price of $200 for it. Please let me know if this is within your budget or if you have any suggestions for a counteroffer.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product's quality, $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $150 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.
